Articles.Content: I want to reinstall 0.90 so that I can play RSS and RO and I don't want to lose all my saves in 1.0. Some help would be appreciated thanks

Well, I'd cut the saves, screenshots & ships folders, maybe even gamedata (you'll see why) & delete the rest. Then go to the main site, sign in, & click on My Account. You can download the most recent update, (90) & the current one too. (1.02) Install, blah blah blah, & then yeah! But, if you want some of the old parts back, go to gamedata>squad>Parts> Whatever you want back, & put it in the current folders.
